title: Low Level Road
details:
Located in hanwella area and Only 2km to Low level road,2.5 km to Hanwella junction, 1.5km to Highlevel road that gives you the easy acess to nearby city areas. At the same time you can have 24hour public transport facility. Located in a calm and quite place where you can live peacefully with all the provided basic facilities.

Three Phase Electricity
Water board line
30ft Wide Road
Easy payment schemes
Attractive discounts for Upfront payments
